1388040.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night Token Pack 144: Medieval Troops
1388040.description:
Devin Night Token Pack 144: Medieval Troops

Every kingdom needs an army, and this collection of brave soldiers stands ready to serve! Where you need stout poleaxe armed guardsmen for the front gate, or musketeers to man the ramparts or the ever reliable sword & shield defenders of the realm, this pack of 70 troops with multiple poses and weapons has you covered!
This product contains:
  • 12 Garrison Soldiers
  • 12 Garrison Soldier Chelm
  • 12 Garrison Soldier Feathers
  • 12 Garrison Soldier Helmed
  • 12 Garrison Soldier Kettle
  • 12 Garrison Soldier Skulls
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:  
James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
